title: Simulation Education Based on Design Expert Competency Model: Application to Language Domains

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of the design process and experience in linguistic structure analysis
context.additional_context: Large-scale language design practice environment utilizing smartphone-based VR simulations.

learning_goals: Apply and explain the 5-stage design expert competency model (awareness-analysis-integration-creation-evaluation) to language design.
Perform over three language structure optimization projects in VR simulations.
Acquire the ability to provide peer feedback using a design expertise assessment rubric.

resources: Mobile VR Headsets (15 units/group), Language Design Simulation Software, Competency Assessment Checklist
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
